title: Why you shouldn't join Y Combinator
dot:
digraph YC_Critique{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#E0E0E0", fontcolor="#000000"];YC[label="Y Combinator (YC)
A startup accelerator providing funding
and access to a network
for equity"];Non_Ergodic[label="Non-Ergodic System
Collective wealth increases
but individual wealth decreases"];VC[label="Venture Capital
Maximizes returns by taking advantage
of non-ergodic nature of the system"];Treasure_Hunting[label="Treasure Hunting Analogy
1. Digging Deep (Inefficient for individuals)
2. Reasonable Search (Efficient for individuals)"];Success_Rate[label="Success Rate
1.25% of YC startups become billion-dollar businesses
26 lifetimes needed to hit jackpot"];Bad_Lessons[label="Bad Lessons from YC
1. Formula for Success
2. Focus on Upside
3. Ignoring Randomness"];Alternative[label="Alternative Approach
Experiment with multiple ideas
Build a portfolio of income streams"];Community[label="Community for Small-Time Entrepreneurs
Focus on attainable success
Embrace mediocrity"];YC->Non_Ergodic;Non_Ergodic->VC;Non_Ergodic->Treasure_Hunting;VC->Success_Rate;YC->Bad_Lessons;Bad_Lessons->Alternative;Alternative->Community;subgraph cluster_1{label="Key Concepts";style="dashed";Treasure_Hunting;Success_Rate;Bad_Lessons;Alternative;}subgraph cluster_2{label="YC Critique";style="dashed";YC;Non_Ergodic;VC;Community;}}
